question: Gold Coast Crown colony was established in Sub-Saharan Africa in 1864 and it got its independence in 1957, thus becoming the first Sub-Saharan free country. What is the name of this country ?
explanation: Ghana is the country which was earlier established as Gold Coast Crown colony in Sub-Saharan Africa in 1864. It got its independence in 1957, thus becoming the first Sub-Saharan free country.
